name: Snow White Solitaire. Charmed Kingdom
description:
After Snow White defeated the Evil Queen, the once peaceful kingdom is facing a new kind of danger! Team up with fantastic characters, visit 5 magical worlds and destroy dark enchantments as you complete challenging solitaire puzzles. Explore fantasy worlds, collect valuable cards, break through obstacles and use magical abilities in this wonderful solitaire adventure!
- Mix of solitaire, hidden objects and puzzles!
- Fun story and characters
- Varied bonuses and helpers
- 5 colorful worlds and 160 fantastic puzzles
- Stunning illustrations and delightful music
